message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many of our customers. I believe it could be a great addition to your collection. Would you like to purchase it for $95?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $85.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your valuation of the product. I would like to counter with an offer of $90 for the product.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering the market value, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $87 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I respect your perspective on the product's value. I would like to counter with an offer of $89 for the product.
Respectfully, Alice, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $88 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position. I would like to counter with an offer of $87.50 for the product.
